div.p: FOR CHRISTMAS GIFTS GO TO BILLOREILLY.COM.
THE FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY. GIVING FOLKS MONEY.
I GIVE ALL MY PROCEEDS FROM BILLOREILLY.COM AWAY TO CHARITY
SO I GET DAILY REQUESTS FROM PEOPLE WHO WANT MONEY.
NOT AN EASY THING. FIRST, WHEN YOU GIVE SOMEBODY
CASH, DON’T EXPECT TO BE PAID BACK.
MANY PEOPLE RATIONALIZE THEY NEED THE MONEY MORE THAN YOU DO
EVEN IF THEY HAVEN’T EARNED IT. GIVE THE MONEY GRACEFULLY OR NOT
AT ALL. IT’S TOUGH TO ASK FOR CHARITY.
YOU DON’T WANT TO DEMEAN THEM. MAKE A DECISION YES OR NO.
BUT DON’T DRAG IT OUT. THIRD, KNOW EXACTLY WHERE THE
MONEY YOU GIVE IS GOING. THAT’S KEY.
CHARITY NAVIGATOR.ORG IS A WEBSITE THAT CAN HELP YOU.
YOU CAN CHECK OUT FOLKS WHO ASK YOU FOR HELP.
STEALING IS AN EPIDEMIC IN THE UNITED STATES.
FINALLY HELPING OTHERS IS PARAMOUNT.
IF IT’S RIGHT AND YOU CAN AFFORD IT, HELP OUT.
GENEROSITY DEFINES A PERSON FOREVER.
THAT’S IT FOR US TONIGHT. CHECK OUT THE FOX NEWS FACTOR
WEBSITE. WE’D LIKE YOU TO SPOUT OFF ABOUT
